import React ,{ forwardRef ,useEffect,useState} from 'react' import logo from './assets/company.png' import './offresCardLeft.css' import timeago from './time' import {url} from "./BaseUrl" const OffreCardsLeft = forwardRef(({ title, company, addresse },ref) => { return (

{title}

{company}

{addresse}

Be the first applicant

) }) export default OffreCardsLeft
